name: Cavern
description: A large cavern creates a natural underground chamber perfect for settlements or storage, but the lack of natural light and ventilation can be deadly. The open space can support large groups, while the surrounding passages can hide threats or valuable resources.
atmosphere: Massive underground chamber creating world of its own beneath surface. Cool, still air scented of earth, stone, and hidden secrets. Lack of natural light creates mystery and danger. Open space supports large groups with community feeling. Surrounding passages hide threats or valuable resources.
